metadata.name: USELESS EMOTIONS #1
metadata.description:
[USELESS EMOTIONS] is the second EP from ARCX, who have experimented with a variety of genres and sounds throughout his career.
Through this album, he wanted to shake off the consuming emotions of the past and build his own sound.
This album is a work in which ARCX directly participated in all fields such as lyrics, composition, arrangement, engineering, rap, and vocals, and sacrificed various emotional lines into a deep sound of his own.
